text:
After debugging class :

org/apache/jmeter/protocol/jms/client/Publisher.java

function initConnection

I noticed that the "this.CONN = ConnectionFactory.getTopicConnection();" 
resulted in this.CONN equals NULL! I've fixed this problem by inserting the 
statement "ConnectionFactory.getTopicConnectionFactory(ctx, connfactory);" 
BEFORE the call to "this.CONN = ConnectionFactory.getTopicConnection();".

My JMS Broker : Sonic MQ 7.0
creator: whordijk@triennium.com
woolfel@yahoo.com
text:
I've patched both the publisher and reciever to lookup the connection factory.
the nightly build should have the fix.

peter

creator: whordijk@triennium.com
text:
Hi Peter, 

Thanx for your patch. I've tested the Nightly Build (jakarta-jmeter-2-
2.20061030); works fine!

Only one question left : who Closes this bug?

Willem.

creator: woolfel@yahoo.com

you can close if you like :)

peter
